title: Interview with John H. Seiradakis about the antikythira mechanis
description:
This dvd is an interview with John H. Seiradakis(1) about the antikythira mechanism(2). 

This work was created by team neutrino(3) and is distributed under Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike licence(4).

The interview is in Greek and unfortunately there are no subtitles, at any language, available. However anyone willing to provide us with subtitles at any language, is more than welcome.

This torrent will be seeded for quite a long time, so a slow start should not be demoralizing.

For more information refer to the research team&#039;s official webpage(5).

Website: http://teamnetr.physics.auth.gr/
